javax.security.identitystore.persistence

Class AbstractIdentityStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • javax.security.identitystore.persistence.AbstractIdentityStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IdentityStore
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    CachedIdentityStore, DatabaseIdentityStore, JaasIdentityStore, LdapIdentityStore

    public abstract class AbstractIdentityStore
extends Object
implements IdentityStore
    AbstractIdentityStore provides common behavior for implementations of IdentityStore.

      • validate

        public CredentialValidationResult validate(Credential credential)
        Default implementation for validating any credential.

        Validation occurs as follows:

        1. If a qualified CDI bean of type CredentialValidator is found, delegate validation to the CredentialValidator.
        2. If the credential is of type UsernamePasswordCredential, delegate validation to the identity store implementation of validateUsernamePassword(javax.security.identitystore.credential.UsernamePasswordCredential).
        3. otherwise, fail validation.
        Specified by:
        validate in interface IdentityStore
        Parameters:
        credential - Credential to validate
        Returns:
        The result
